mapper.insert: insert into orders (oid, ocode, ostatus, uid, opayment, opaymentType, sid, opostage, opaymentTime, sendTime, closeTime, endTime, createTime, updateTime) values (#{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ocode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ostatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opaymenttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opostage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{opaymenttime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{closetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update orders set ocode = #{ocode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ostatus = #{ostatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opayment = #{opayment,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, opaymentType = #{opaymenttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opostage = #{opostage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, opaymentTime = #{opaymenttime,jdbcType=DATE}, sendTime = #{sendtime,jdbcType=DATE}, closeTime = #{closetime,jdbcType=DATE}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select oid, ocode, ostatus, uid, opayment, opaymentType, sid, opostage, opaymentTime, sendTime, closeTime, endTime, createTime, updateTime from orders where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
